reviewText: I watched this a few years back and loved it it was so different and the language sounds awesome. I couldn't remember the name of the movie until i recently thought of the weird barrier they had for the holographic people. Sandy and Junior's voices are really beautiful i loved the singing. The CGI was something i have to say was a lot better than i thought it would be.

This movie sucks it's just ........ terrible .... the story it childish to the extreme , even the most young child will be bored by this , the plot makes no sense , and the acting of Sandy and Junior is as goood as their music ,  DO NOT WATCH THIS MOVIE , do not LISTEN TO SANDY AND JUNIOR MUSIC. these two are just what is of most BAD is Brazilian music and cinema .
